p: DRC in general and its capital Kinshasa in particular are experiencing epidemiologic and nutritional transitions which are responsible for the increase in non-communicable diseases (NCD) such as cardiovascular diseases, Type-2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) and stroke. All of these are related to oxidative stress [ 15], aging and climate variability (El Nino-La Nina [ 16] and HM [ 8].
